messages.title: Dear Voter,
messages.content: I have lived in the Constituency for 37 years. I am standing to ensure that the will of the British people is fulfilled. UKIP is the party that guarantees BREXIT. I have the necessary skills and experience to be your MP. I know the workings of local government. As a trustee of a Charity caring for people with learning disabilities I understand the practical difficulties affecting the care sector. This Constituency has many challenges e.g. policing, NHS, transport, planning. I will represent everyone.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Control immigration to prevent out of control numbers.
Reduce spending on what they deem wasteful foreign aid.
Opposing the European Court of Human Rights.
Protect British fishing waters from future Brussels controls.
Foresees a care crisis and invites voters to fight for the NHS.
Concerned with cuts to police and armed forces.

issues.brexitEurope: UKIP is the party that guarantees BREXIT.
issues.governance: I know the workings of local government.
issues.health: This Constituency has many challenges e.g. NHS.
issues.immigration: Control immigration to prevent out of control numbers.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have lived in the Constituency for 37 years.

politicalExperience.achievements: Caring for people with learning disabilities.

images.caption: A photo of Duncan Strachan with a caption 'DUNCAN STRACHAN in North-East Bedfordshire'
Infographic showing rising net migration into the UK from 2009 to 2016 with a message 'Don't trust Theresa'

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet is against Theresa May and advises not to trust her.
